sentence.Network_en: Although he's ninety, his mental faculties remain unimpaired.
sentence.Network_cn: 他虽年届九旬，但头脑仍然清晰。

sentence.Network_en: All your faculties have come into play in your work.
sentence.Network_cn: 在你的工作中,你的全部才能已起到了作用.

sentence.Network_en: He is a superman in mental faculties [ physical strength ].
sentence.Network_cn: 他在智力 [ 体力 ] 上是个超人.

entry.def: Your faculties are your physical and mental abilities.

example.ex: He was drunk and not in control of his faculties...
example.tran: 他喝醉了，浑身都不听使唤了。

example.ex: It is also a myth that the faculty of hearing is greatly increased in blind people.
example.tran: 盲人的听力会大幅增强也是一种谬谈。

entry.tran: (大学的)院系;(大学院系的)教职工
entry.def: A faculty is a group of related departments in some universities, or the people who work in them.

example.ex: ...the Faculty of Social and Political Sciences.

entry.tran: (大学、学院或院系的)全体教员
entry.def: A faculty is all the teaching staff of a university or college, or of one department.

example.ex: The faculty agreed on a change in the requirements...
example.tran: 全体教师一致同意修改规定。

example.ex: How can faculty improve their teaching so as to encourage creativity?
example.tran: 教师们如何才能改进教学以激发创造性呢？
